extendedInfo.description: Dual Screen Browser for Honeycomb is an Web browser application that has two browser windows. It's convenient to browse two different Web sites at the same time. You can also share one Android tablet with your friend and browse their favorite Web pages.Basic Web browser features are supported.- Homepage, Bookmark.- Back, Forward and Reload.- Search (Google, Bing and Twitter).- (Experimental) Play HTML5/FLASH videos.Special features supported in this version.- Resize screen.- Rotate screen.- Change UI Theme.This application is optimized for Android 3.0 Honeycomb or later. Tested with Motorola XOOM (Android 3.1/3.2) and LG Optimus Pad (3.0). Send feedback to curry.cat.gti@gmail.com or @currycatgti on Twitter.

reviews.title: Simon :(  Samsung galaxy note 10.1
reviews.comment: Use to work great untill it started to crash now I cannot able to open it please fix it.. I need it bad. I love this app ! Will change the rating full stars when this app  works
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SUPERB!!!
reviews.comment: Truly a well developed app!! Amazing!! Keep up the great work!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great idea
reviews.comment: I love thus idea. I do hope you will put url bars. So we go to the sites directly without googling it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs URL bar
reviews.comment: This app is great for the most part, however it just simply needs a URL bar! It would be much more useful!
reviews.author: Alexander Mereness

reviews.title: Have been looking
reviews.comment: I\'ve  been looking for something like this for a while. Samsung Galaxy 10.1 tablet. Keeps crashing. Also, as stated by others, you need to include a url/address bar for each screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Perfect for dual screen Sony Tablet P.  Is it possible to disable auto rotate screen? And I still canot find the url bar. Is there one? Thanks and please please continue the work on ICS.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great idea...
reviews.comment: But force-closes as soon as HTML starts loading. Extra star \'cause it\'s a brilliant idea though. ^_^ (Acer A200, ICS update)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC One X
reviews.comment: It would be perfect if the apps support full screen ! For sure I will give five stars
reviews.author: Frank W .Tan

reviews.title: I like this but
reviews.comment: I like this idea, but it won\'t seem to work on my phone and my phone is a nexus 4. I really hope you\'ll be able to fix it asap, my android version is the new 4.3
reviews.author: Itai Axelrod

reviews.title: Needs some work...
reviews.comment: Gave it 3 stars..seems a little unstable..should make it so u can type URLs for either page...fix the kinks and i\'d say its a must have app for tablets!
reviews.author: Dom Griffin

reviews.title: URL?
reviews.comment: Me no see URL bar. Works perfect on Asus Transformer Prime don\'t listen to the other guy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant idea
reviews.comment: However i rated it a 3 untill more features become available such as tabbed browsing....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What a neat idea
reviews.comment: I hadn\'t really considered this possibility for web browsing, but I actually really like it. Its smooth for just browsing as far as I have tried it and you can move around both pages quite fluidly. I\'m used to a URL bar and it would be nice, but having Google as a home page makes finding pages easy. I know people who don\'t even know what a URL is and just use Google anyway. Great app thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: the best dual screen, no blank screen or blank addreas
reviews.comment: i try similiar app like this, realy disapoint when i want open addreas from google result, its blank will not open. but with this app, i can open addreas from google result. but some times force close. but still better from the other.
reviews.author: ans andy

reviews.title: Dual screen browser
reviews.comment: Very good idea. Web pages did load quick on left and right side, but however white screen blocks started to pop up on webpages as I toggled back and forth on Samsung tablet. Keep tweaking it very good idea with split screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great start. Needs more polish.
reviews.comment: If app FC for you turn off wifi then open app again OR open stock browser - press home button - launch dual browser.  Had a few FC when I first loaded this app. To my surprise I was able to open youtube vid (flash) in left screen and continue browsing web in right screen with the youtube vid still playing!!! ASUS TF101 w/ ICS (4.0.3)    Needs: - url bar - user agent selection for each screen - cache clear - download file support - better support for html/flash video on right screen (landscape orientation) - option to not auto fill forms -more responsive dev
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: it\'s ok sort-of
reviews.comment: But where\'s the web address entry bar? ? ? bbc videos play fine. Address bar please.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just one thing
reviews.comment: Very nice lay out. Would love to see it in the option box when clicking on a link presenting me which browser to open with. I see my other browsers but not this one though. Other than that, great work overall.
reviews.author: Hans Carlson
